segments.text: What would you like to have for dinner ? Chicken or beef ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What kind of drinks do you have ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , we have all kinds of beverages in addition to fruit juices .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In that case , let me have a glass of orange juice .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would like to have some tea as well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Another flight attendant is coming down the aisle with coffee and tea .
segments.speaker: S1
